title: Vision. [No. 26]
creator_credit: Ted Steeg, Jim Strongin, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
brief_description: Cinemagazine: School of the Arts; Los Angeles Freeway; fish farming with the Lummis - an Indian tgribe has mastered the science of fish-farming; frostbiting - people who sail all year round braving winter winds and temperatures; homesteading - deserted town houses are granted to citizens willing to make them liveable again; head in the stars - Ken Kulak, 12 years old, runs a planetarium and studies computer sciences and astronomy; Theater of the Deaf - a repertory company tours the world performing for deaf and non-deaf people alike.
creator_credit_for_label: Ted Steeg, Jim Strongin, Ted Steeg Productions and United States Information Agency
